message:
New Job Board for Egyptian Geeks. Please join:
https://www.facebook.com/groups/EgyptianGeeksJobs/

Please move all your job ads to this new page.
Some rules:
 Place your job ad here. Your ad should include the following items:
- Job must be directly related to the IT sector and for IT professionals.
- Ad must include job title, (brief) description, and contact info.
- Contact info must be email address or link to submission page.
- Any ad considered to be link bait or spam will be removed.
- Any ad that doesn't include enough info will be removed.
- Any user who doesn't follow these instructions will be banned from group.

Starting today, All new job ads will be removed from this group.

Thank you
name: EgyptianGeeksJobs

data.message: Because everything has limits :) I was really against mixing jobs with what we do here, do I +++++++++++++++++++ your decision buddy :)
This morning I had to scroll past 4 job postings till I got to an actual post. That was a sign LOL
